title: Add dark mode scheduling
body: Let users set dark mode to follow system, sunset-to-sunrise, or a custom schedule.

title: Inline comment threads
body: Allow comments directly on specific lines or sections so discussions stay contextual.

title: Bulk tag management
body: Add a multi-select view to apply or remove tags from many items at once.

title: Weekly feedback digest
body: Send a weekly email summary of new feedback, top-voted items, and status changes.

title: Saved filters
body: Let users save and share filter presets for quick access to common views.

title: Export feedback to CSV
body: Provide a one-click export of filtered feedback lists for offline analysis.
